import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import * as LeituraAPI from './LeituraAPI' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import './App.css'; class Home extends Component { state ={ categorySelect: '', } onClick = (a) =>{ const ab = LeituraAPI.getPostsForCategories(a) this.setState({categorySelect: a}) } render() { const { posts, categories } = this.props; const {categorySelect} = this.state return (

{posts.filter(post => post.category === this.state.categorySelect(

{post.title}

{post.category}
{post.author}
{post.timestamp}
{post.commentCount} comments

{post.body}

CONTINUE LENDO
{post.voteScore}
EDIT

))}

); } } Home.propTypes = { posts: PropTypes.array.isRequired, //categories: PropTypes.string.isRequired, }; export default Home;
